nodes.title: Before we get started, let's make sure we're complying with the FAA.
nodes.description: Even in amateur rocketry, above a certain threshold, you need to register your rocket with the FAA and obtain a certificate.

nodes.title: According to the FAA, the rocket may weigh no more than 1500 grams, with a maximum weight of 125g of propellant.
nodes.description: Let's try 3D printing one and choosing parts that comply with FAA regulations.
